ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:23:46 [Issue ID 4000-140349] urn:comicvine:4000-140349 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 17:46:00. [Issue ID 369718]
ComicInfo.Summary: Lights... Camera... Action! The cameras are rolling for the auditions of a new, made-for-TV superhero team: WildGuard. Hundreds of superheroes will try out, but only five will have what it takes to make the team...if they survive! Join a host of heroes, through the agony of competition and unforeseen dangers, as they hope to be selected by a panel of judges, including the mysterious Producer "X". Who will make the cut? You make the call! Log on to www.wildguard.com and cast your vote for the hero you want to make the team. Written and drawn by Todd Nauck, the artist of popular DC Comics series, Young Justice. With superheroes from around the globe showing up for the WildGuard casting call, a variety of talented and non-talented auditioners converge on the set. It's a battle of egos, nerves, and skill as the first round of tryouts gets underway. What will the hopefuls (and producers) do when the auditions are suddenly interrupted? Who will be the first to feel the sting of rejection? Don't miss your chance to be a part of the creation of this brand new super team!
ComicInfo.Title: Part One: The Arrival
